original_title: Csendhez szokott szív - Úton Eperjes Károllyal
overview: aka A heart accustomed to silence (2022) "We walk on the way of the God seeking man with Kossuth Award winner talent Károly Eperjes. In our fist episode we talk with benedictine monk Izsák Baán, with priest Gergő Bese and we can listen wisdom monologue from Antal Spányi county bishop and Balázs Barsi franciscan monk." "This short was produced in co-production with National Film Institute, Garantiqa and Lighthouse Film."
